Events

Where Wellington's AI community learns, builds, and connects.

Talks, workshops, hackathons, and socials — all free, all welcome.

Subscribe to Calendar

Upcoming
talk 15 MAR

Introduction to Large Language Models

A comprehensive introduction to how LLMs work, from transformers to RLHF. No prior ML experience needed — open to students from all faculties.

18:00 — 19:30 Cotton Building CO350, Kelburn Campus

Dr. Sarah Chen, Senior Lecturer, School of ECS
workshop 22 MAR

Prompt Engineering Workshop

Hands-on workshop covering practical prompt engineering techniques for Claude, GPT, and open-source models. Bring your laptop.

14:00 — 17:00 AM Building AM101, Kelburn Campus
hackathon 12 APR

VicAI Hackathon 2026

48-hour AI hackathon. Teams of 2-4. Build something that matters for Aotearoa. Prizes from our sponsors. Food and drinks provided.

09:00 — 17:00 The Hub, Kelburn Campus
talk 05 APR

AI Ethics in Aotearoa: Maori Data Sovereignty

A panel discussion exploring the intersection of AI, ethics, and indigenous data rights in Aotearoa New Zealand. Featuring researchers from Te Herenga Waka and community leaders.

17:30 — 19:00 Hunter Building HU323, Kelburn Campus

Panel: Dr. Tane Raukura, Hana Patel, Prof. James Liu
workshop 19 APR

Computer Vision with PyTorch

Build an image classifier from scratch using PyTorch. We'll cover CNNs, transfer learning, and model evaluation. Intermediate Python knowledge recommended.

13:00 — 16:00 Cotton Building CO246, Kelburn Campus
social 03 MAY

Industry Night: AI in Wellington

Hear from Wellington-based companies using AI — Xero, Datacom, Soul Machines, and more. Networking drinks afterwards.

18:00 — 20:30 Rutherford House Lecture Theatre 1, Pipitea Campus

Multiple industry speakers
workshop 10 MAY

Reinforcement Learning from Scratch

Code a reinforcement learning agent step by step. We'll implement Q-learning and policy gradients in Python. Bring your laptop.

14:00 — 17:00 AM Building AM101, Kelburn Campus
talk 17 MAY

NZ AI Startups: Founder Stories

Three NZ-based AI startup founders share their journeys — the wins, the failures, and what they wish they knew. Q&A to follow.

18:00 — 19:30 Rutherford House RH LT2, Pipitea Campus

Multiple founders
Past Events
social 28 FEB

End-of-Trimester Social

Casual hangout at Hashigo Zake. Meet fellow AI enthusiasts, swap project ideas, unwind after exams. All welcome.

17:30 — 20:00 Hashigo Zake, 25 Taranaki St, Te Aro
social 16 FEB

O-Week: Meet VicAI

Come say hi at our Orientation Week stall. Free stickers, sign up for the society, and find out what we have planned for 2026.

10:00 — 15:00 Kelburn Campus Quad
